name: Roo.state.Provider
desc: Abstract base class for state provider implementations. This class provides methods for encoding and decoding typed variables including dates and defines the Provider interface.

methods.name: clear
methods.desc: Clears a value from the state

methods.name: decodeValue
methods.desc: Decodes a string previously encoded with {@link #encodeValue}.

methods.name: get
methods.desc: Returns the current value for a key

params.name: defaultValue
params.desc: A default value to return if the key's value is not found

methods.name: set
methods.desc: Sets the value for a key

methods.name: encodeValue
methods.desc: Encodes a value including type information.  Decode with {@link #decodeValue}.

events.name: *statechange
events.desc: Fires when a state change occurs.

params.name: key
params.desc: The state key which was changed

params.name: value
params.desc: The encoded value for the state
